message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think it's fair that we split it evenly, but I'm willing to give you a bit more since you offered first.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve more
Alice, with each round, the money is becoming less valuable. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to get a better share for myself.
I'll take a smaller share, but I still think I deserve more than you're offering
